title: fswatch background job outputs TTY noise
description: When fswatch starts, it outputs job control messages like '[4] 73252' and '[4] + suspended (tty output)' which clutter the Ralph display. These should be silenced.

acceptanceCriteria.text: fswatch background job doesn't output job control messages
No '[N] PID' messages visible in terminal
Background job properly detached from TTY
Watcher still functions correctly (file changes detected)
Clean shutdown on ralph exit (no orphan processes)
